downloadTitle: Best together with Microsoft 365, Surface, and Edge poster
downloadDescription: See how the best-together combination of Microsoft 365, Microsoft Surface, and Microsoft Edge takes advantage of integrated identity, apps, security, and IT management.
detailsSection: This PDF shows how the combination of Microsoft 365, Microsoft Surface, and Microsoft Edge is best when used together for your organization, whether it is an enterprise, a small or medium-sized business, or an educational institution. Combining these products leverages product-wide integration of a common identity, cloud and local apps, comprehensive security, and IT management of installs and updates.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
